Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy and growing with plenty of water and light.
The student can draw a plant that is unhealthy or not growing well because it lacks water.
The student can draw a plant that is unhealthy or not growing well because it lacks light.
The student can illustrate the effects of water on plant growth by comparing two plants, one with water and one without.
The student can illustrate the effects of light on plant growth by comparing two plants, one with light and one in the dark.
